entry.title: In Which Hal Jordan Is The Smart One
entry.summary:
Author: AlcyoneEtaTauri

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,471Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 156

Summary: Hal Jordan has never heard of the billionaire playboy Brucie Wayne and his misadventures. Ollie and Barry try to rectify that - in the earshot of Batman.What Bruce Wayne doesn't expect is for the Green Lantern to see through the ruse.

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,587Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 199

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.

entry.title: Borderline
entry.summary:
Author: Captain_Kinky

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,283Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 367

Summary: “Bruce?” Hal dubiously asked as if questioning whether his sight betrayed him, the pep in his step immediately faltering.“Oh, you two know each other?” Carol asked, distancing herself from the handsome billionaire.“No, I’m afraid we don’t.” Bruce turned to Hal, and his words were a pointed warning. “After all, what would a billionaire and a test pilot have in common before now, hm?”“Right, right. No, uh, I just mean… Bruce Wayne. Crazy to see a billionaire here.” Hal came closer to the pair, leaning closer to the man as he managed to grit out, “Why are you here?”“Well, Mr. Jordan–”“Hal is fine.”“I was hoping to fund a new project for Ferris Air, and I’ve selected you as my test pilot.”

entry.title: To cage a star
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,123Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 699

Summary: "Excuse me, um... I need to find someone, would you- would you mind helping me?"The lady who is asked is an old woman at a bus stop, with a warm expression on her face."Yes, dear, who are you looking for?""Um..." The little girl in the pale green dress reaches for her small purse and pulls out a carefully kept piece of paper to give the old lady. "His name is written on the back...""And who may this person be to you, dear?""My dad... Mom said Mr. Bruce Wayne is my dad."

entry.title: someone, fill my heart and quench my thirst
entry.summary:
Author: strawberrylemontart

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,535Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 92

Summary: "I'm sure he's no stranger to people appreciating his looks.""But it's because of that, that he could be thinking Hal's intentions are underhanded or disingenuous as theirs." Dinah reminded the table, "Like you said yourself Hal, Bruce offers up a lot of himself. There are probably few things he holds close to his chest. If he thinks you're just eager to get him into bed, he's probably not going to react well to those advances. I'm just thinking out loud here, but he seems the type to want more than that."-----Hal has been trying to spend more time with Bruce and flirting with him to make their meetings to discuss investigations, feel more like dates. Miscommunication keeps them from taking a step forward with their relationship, and only after Hal gets sense knocked into him, does he have the chance of clearing things up with Bruce.
